```cs
<ContentPage xmlns=»http://schemas.microsoft.com/
             dotnet/2021/maui»
             xmlns:x=»http://schemas.microsoft.com/
             winfx/2009/xaml»
             x:Class="MyMauiApp.MainPage">
    <StackLayout>
        <Button x:Name="MyButton"
                Text="Click Me"
                Clicked="OnButtonClicked"/>
        <Label x:Name="MessageLabel"
               Text="Welcome to MAUI!"/>
    </StackLayout>
</ContentPage>
```
